title: daasharathi
sahitya:
dAsharathI nI rNamu dIrpa nA taramA parama pAvana nAma



anupallavi



AshadIra dUra dEshamulanu prakAshimpa jEsina rasika shirOmaNi



caraNam



bhaktilEni kavijAla varEnyulu bhAva meruga lErani kalilOna

jani

    bhukti mukti galgunani kIrtanamula bOdhincina tyAgarAja

karArcita
